name: Flip & Flop
description:
So this is our version of the classic PONG,

The art was made by Mayur games

HOW TO PLAY:: Arrow keys to control the right paddle w,s keys to control the left paddle r for restarting if you hit the paddle a point adds if you leave and the ball bounces of the side then the opponent gets a point. the first one to get 10 wins. a really simple game to play with a friend. Made in 2 days.
